```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

d <- read_csv(here("s.csv"))
```

```{r}
d %>% 
  rename(t = `...1`) %>% 
  filter(t < 150) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = prob, color = as.factor(stimulus_id))) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() 

d %>% 
  rename(t = `...1`) %>% 
  filter(t < 150) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = surprisal, color = as.factor(stimulus_id))) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() 
```
